long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Having difficulty reading text displayed on the Internet? It can be annoying to read standard fonts online especially if you have a dyslexia condition, but don’t worry, the Dyslexic Font Chrome extension is here for you.  

By installing this extension, users with dyslexia or who otherwise have trouble reading web pages can instantly make web content easier to read, and in turn have a much better and much more enjoyable experience when it comes to reading on the internet. 

Key Features of this chrome extension: 

One-click activation 

Converts all texts with web-font to dyslexia friendly fonts 

Improves readability and comprehension 

Customizable font options 

Compatible with most websites 


How to Use? 

1: Install the Extension. 

Let me give you detailed instructions: First, open the Chrome Web Store and simply download the Dyslexic Font extension. 

2. Activate the Extension. 

To use the Dyslexic Font extension, right click on Dyslexic Fonts in the Chrome toolbar. 

3: Personal Touch to the Font Preferences 

Customize font and size in the extension option according to user’s desire. 

4: Get More Cohesion 

Visit any website, and the text on the website will be displayed in a dyslexia-friendly font as per the selected one. 


Usefulness of the Study to Whom: 

Dyslexic Font is particularly valuable to people who suffer from dyslexia since they find it challenging to read fonts in the normal style. It becomes also useful for people with other reading and comprehension problems, for those who have a vision impairment or for anyone who has difficulties reading some web fonts. 


 Why is it Useful? 

This extension adds value to online reading by offering fonts that are not only tailored to reduce the challenges of dyslexia but also to improve the overall reading experience. Additional font changes are intended to minimize confusion between similar letters and enhance the text readability so that reading is less strenuous and more productive. 


FAQs 

1: If I want to change the font of this page, can I? 

A: Yes, the extension allows users to customize the font style and size in the extension’s setting that is in the form of a drop-down list. 

2: Does the extension work on every site? 

A: It is supported by all websites but there are times when the websites may have their own fonts.  

3: Is there a cost to use Dyslexic Font? 

A: No, Dyslexic Font is free to use. 

4: Will it slow down my browser? 

A: No, Dyslexic Font is lightweight and should not impact your browser's performance. 

5: How do I turn off the extension? 

A: Click the Dyslexic Font icon in the Chrome toolbar and select "Deactivate" to turn off the extension.
